---
# Content is auto generated
# Manual changes will be overwritten!
title: Menu
---
It displays a contextual or dropdown menu anchored to a specific view. The menu is organized into groups of items, where each item has content
and an action callback. Empty groups are ignored.

## Constructors
### Menu
Menu creates a new menu with the given anchor and groups.
Empty groups are discarded when rendering.

---
## Methods
| Method | Description |
|--------| ------------|
| `Frame(frame Frame)` | Frame sets the layout frame of the menu. |
---
